description: Crispy on the outside, moist and bursting with juicy summer corn kernels on the inside, these crave-worthy vegan corn fritters are easy to make and absolutely scrumptious!
name: Vegan Corn Fritters (Baked or Fried!
recipeIngredient: 3 cups fresh corn kernels, (about 4 ears worth of corn (Note 1)
3/4 cup unflavored and unsweetened non-dairy milk
1/2 cup peanut oil, (or as needed (for fried fritters only)

recipeInstructions.text: If you're planning on baking your fritters, preheat the oven to 400°F and line a couple of baking sheets with parchment paper.
Stir the corn, flour, cornmeal, baking powder, and salt together in a large mixing bowl.
Pour in the milk and stir, just until the ingredients are thoroughly mixed.
